key.name: suppress-logout-restart-shutdown
key.summary: Suppress the dialog to confirm logout, restart and shutdown action
key.description: Whether or not to show confirmation dialogs for logout, restart and shutdown actions.

key.name: suppress-logout-menuitem
key.summary: Remove the Log Out item from the session menu
key.description: Makes it so that the logout button doesn’t show in the session menu.

key.name: suppress-restart-menuitem
key.summary: Remove the Restart item from the session menu
key.description: Makes it so that the restart button doesn’t show in the session menu.

key.name: suppress-shutdown-menuitem
key.summary: Remove the shutdown item from the session menu
key.description: Makes it so that the shutdown button doesn’t show in the session menu.

key.name: force-restart-menuitem
key.summary: Force the visibility of Restart item in the session menu
key.description: Makes it so that the restart shows in the session menu even in the environments where it should not show.

key.name: show-real-name-on-panel
key.summary: Determine the visibility of the User's real name on the panel
key.description: Allow for the Removal of the users name from the panel

key.name: user-show-menu
key.description: Allow for the user list to be hidden by the user.
